title: People applying for probate
titleWithCodicil: Executors named in the will and any codicils
question: Do you want to apply with anyone else?
hintText:
If there are other people entitled to inherit, you can make a joint application with up to 3 of them. 
They will also be named on the grant of probate.
hintTextDeceasedName: All applicants will be given the legal right to deal with {{ deceasedName }}’s estate. This includes:
bullet1: collecting the estate’s assets (property, money and possessions)
bullet3: distributing what is left to the people entitled to it (the ‘beneficiaries’)

executorsNamed.required: Select 'Yes' if there are more executors named in the will
executorsNamed.requiredCodicils: Select 'Yes' if there are more executors named in the will and any codicils
executorsNamed.invalid: Number of executors must be a whole number between 1 and 20
